subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Fetches a single n8n tag by ID or name. When using ID, the API's GET /tags/{id} endpoint is used directly. When using name, the LIST endpoint is used with client-side filtering.
---

# n8n_tag (Data Source)

Fetches a single n8n tag by ID or name. When using ID, the API's GET /tags/{id} endpoint is used directly. When using name, the LIST endpoint is used with client-side filtering.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Tag identifier. Either `id` or `name` must be specified.
- `name` (String) Tag name. Either `id` or `name` must be specified.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the tag was created
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the tag was last updated
